title: World Ocean Day
context: ยง8-12 World Ocean Day. June 8 of each year shall be known and recognized as &ldquo;World Ocean Day&rdquo; to celebrate and honor the oceans of the world, improve international relations, and increase public awareness of conservation management of the ocean environment; provided that this day is not and shall not be construed to be a state holiday. All citizens shall be encouraged to observe and celebrate the blessings of the oceans and endeavor to become caretakers of the ocean for future generations. [L 1998, c 21, ยง2; am L 2009, c 2, ยง1]
